page.title: 02A WORSBROUGH LEGEND
page.content: The legend of the{Blue Lady}has existed in this area for as long as anyone can remember. The Blue Lady is said to haunt Worsbrough in search of her long-lost lover. She haunts places like{Kingwell Woods},the reservoir and even{Stainborough}.The Blue Lady lived at the time of the {Civil War}.Her lover was a Cavalier soldier and she helped the Cavaliers escape from the{Roundheads}through a tunnel, by leaving a light in the window of her house when it was safe to go through. At last she was killed because of this. It was said that gold was hidden in the tunnel that the soldiers used and some men once went there looking for it but they were scared by the sound of marching and ran away. The ghost of the Blue Lady moves slowly and leaves a blue path wherever she goes.
